attributes.action: ANDREW GRIFFITHS RESIGN AS OUR MP BURTON DESERVES BETTER
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition to call for a by-election in Burton-On-Trent and Andrew Griffiths to resign immediately.
attributes.background: Andrew Griffiths MP has shown yet again he can't be trusted to serve our constituents. What i have been reading over the last 24 hours is quite disgusting and this guy cannot continue. Please sign this petition to call for a by-election in Burton-On-Trent and Andrew Griffiths to resign immediately

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
